Metadata: Minnesota's per capita boat registration has tended to lead the nation with one boat for every 6.5 resident adults. The 629,291 boats registered in 1984 places Minnesota as one of the top 3 states in boat registration along with Michigan and California. Both the national and state numbers of boat-in-use and registered boats is expected to continue to increase over the next several years. This advisory note includes graphs of yearly breakdowns by boat type and hull material.
